description: Quiet and cozy studio with an updated kitchen and in-unit washer & dryer. Close to Central Park for walks or jogs around the Onassis Reservoir. You’ll love the comfy bed, the awesome couch, and the desk by the window. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Spacious Upper West Side Studio near Central Park
review: Had both of my parents visit for 10 days from Korea and Kristen's place was perfect. Very clean, organized, comfortable bed, well equipped kitchen, much sunlight, TV, and overall very cozy home-y feel. She was very flexible and responsive to all communications. I would definitely recommend here for anyone.
